name: Alpha Posture Training
description: Developing body language that conveys strength, confidence, and authority in all social interactions.

cards.title: Commanding Presence Through Stance
cards.description: Training in body alignment, foot positioning, and posture to radiate confidence.
cards.bulletpoints: Proper Spine Alignment, Power Stance Training, Energy Projection Through Posture

cards.title: Micro-Expressions and Eye Contact
cards.description: Controlling subtle facial cues and eye movements to establish dominance and trust.
cards.bulletpoints: Eye Contact Calibration, Emotionally Controlled Facial Responses, Strategic Blink Patterns

cards.title: The Walk of Power
cards.description: Mastering gait control and movement fluidity to exhibit strength and intentionality.
cards.bulletpoints: Rhythm and Flow, Shoulder Set Techniques, Speed and Directional Adjustments
